summary: Completed comprehensive authentication testing for Creators Hive HQ. JWT-based authentication system is fully functional with login, registration, protected routes, and logout capabilities.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided

passed_tests: Login page renders at /login with email, password fields and submit button
Login with default admin credentials (admin@hivehq.com / admin123) redirects to dashboard
Dashboard shows logged-in user info in sidebar (System Admin)
Sign Out button in sidebar logs out user and redirects to login
Accessing protected routes (/users, /calculator, /arris) without auth redirects to login
API endpoint POST /api/auth/login returns JWT token with user info
API endpoint POST /api/auth/register creates new admin user
API endpoint GET /api/auth/verify validates token and returns user
API endpoint GET /api/auth/me returns current user details
Invalid login credentials show error message
New user can login after registration
Protected route access control works correctly
